title: Roja Roja Lyrics Kadhalar Dhinam
stanzas:
Roja Roja Song Lyrics Kadhalar Dhinam
#ARRahman #UnniKrishnan #Vaali

Roja....Roja ...
Roja Roja Roja Roja
Roja Roja Roja Roja

Roja Roja Roja Roja
Roja Roja Roja Roja

kanda pinnae unnidathil
ennai vittu veedu vandhaen

unai thendral
theendavum vidamaatten.
andha thingal
theendavum vidamaatten.
unai vaeru kaigalil
tharamaatten
naan tharamaatten
naan tharamaatten

Roja....Roja ...
Roja....Roja ...

nilathil un nizhal
vila yaenguven.
nizhal vilundha manalayum
madiyinil thaanguven

udaiyena eduthu
enai uduthu
noolaadai kodimalar
idaiyinai uruthum
roja.

un peyar mella
naan sonnadhum
en veettu rojaakkal
pookkindrana

ornaal unnai kaanavidil
engae un anbendru
kaetkindrana

nee vandhaal
maruganam vidyum
en vaanamae.

mazhayil nee
nenaigayil enakku
kaaichal varum

veyilil nadakkayil
enaku vaervai varum

udalgal naam rendu
unarvugal ondru
roja roja..roja..

Roja Roja Roja Roja
Roja Roja Roja Roja

kanda pinnae unnidathil
ennai vittu veedu vandhaen

illaiyavalin idai
oru noolagam.
padithidavaa pani vizhum
iravugal aayiram.

idaiveli edharkku
sol namakku
un naanam oru murai
vidumurai eduthaal enna.

ennai theenda koodaathena
vaanodu sollaadhu
vangak kadal.

ennai yaendha koodaathena
kaiyyodu solladhu
pullaangulazh.

nee thottaal nilavinil
karaigalum neengumae.
vizhigalil valindhidum
azhagu neer veelzhchiye

enakku nee
unai thara edharku
aaraaichiye

unai vida vaeru
ninaivugal yaedhu
roja roja. roja..

Roja Roja Roja Roja
Roja Roja Roja Roja

kanda pinnae unnidathil
ennai vittu veedu vandhaen

seo.description: Get the complete Roja Roja Lyrics Kadhalar Dhinam from Kadhalar Dhinam. Read the lyrics penned by Vaali and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Unnikrishnan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
